            <section aria-label="Body">
            <div class="link-back hidden-xs"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>
</div>
            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166772' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166772 wv-inplace-rte'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Graduate</span></p>

<h1>International Student Information</h1>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3166772 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/tuition-financial-aid'>Tuition and Financial Aid</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/resources'>Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/grad/international'>International</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  


              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166770' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166770 wv-inplace-rte'><p style="text-align: justify;">If you are considering graduate study as an international student at the Berkeley campus, then please visit the following resources for additional information.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><a href="http://internationaloffice.berkeley.edu/">Berkeley International Office</a> - Here, you will find information about visas, living at Berkeley as well as find valuable links relevant to anyone from abroad who is considering study or research at Berkeley as well as for those who are already here and need information on programs and workshops addressing international student needs.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><a href="http://grad.berkeley.edu/students/">Information for International Students</a> - This page is part of the Graduate Division&rsquo;s admissions information for prospective international students. Please review it for additional information on coming to Berkeley as a graduate student.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Additionally, if you intend to enroll in a Ph.D. program, such as ours, please note that international students must pay the non-resident tuition costs until they advance to candidacy. Once advanced to candidacy (usually at the end of the 3rd year of study), non-resident tuition is waived for international Ph.D. students. Until then, however, it is impossible to waive this significant fee. For a full listing of tuition and fees, please refer to the <a href="http://registrar.berkeley.edu/Default.aspx?PageID=feesched.html">registrar&rsquo;s information on fees</a>. Also, keep in mind that the campus uses specific dollar amounts to estimate an individual graduate student&rsquo;s budget for each academic year. International students must show proof of financial ability to cover each and every amount listed. <a href="http://financialaid.berkeley.edu/">Current year student budgets</a> are available for your information.</p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3166770 -->
            
            <div class="text-right hidden-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>
            </section>
          </div>

           <div class="col-md-3 col-sm-3 hidden-sm col-xs-12 sidebar-right">

</div>
          </div>

      <div id="footer" class="footer">
        <div class="row">

            <div class="resource-list">
<hr>
  <h3>Graduate Resources</h3>

<ul class="list-unstyled">
  
  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2906307'--> <div id='kdb_id_2906307' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://grad.berkeley.edu/academic-progress/forms/">Graduate Division Forms & Applications &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://grad.berkeley.edu/academic-progress/forms/">grad.berkeley.edu/academic-progress/forms/</a></p>
  
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2906307'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632294'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632294' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://studentcentral.berkeley.edu/">CAL Student Central &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://studentcentral.berkeley.edu/">studentcentral.berkeley.edu/</a></p>
  <p>For questions about financial aid, registration blocks, and more, visit CAL Student Central</p>

    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632294'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632295'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632295' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://internationaloffice.berkeley.edu/">Information for International Students &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://internationaloffice.berkeley.edu/">internationaloffice.berkeley.edu/</a></p>
  
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632295'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_3642291'--> <div id='kdb_id_3642291' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="">Resources Compiled by the Ethnic Studies Department  &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href=""></a></p>
  <p><strong>Medical emergencies &ndash; </strong>For life-threatening emergencies, call 911.</p>

<p><strong>Medical care (non-emergency) &ndash; </strong>University Health Service&rsquo;s urgent care hours are Saturday, 9:30 a.m. to 5 p.m., and Sunday, 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. For after-hours care: <a href="https://uhs.berkeley.edu/after-hours">uhs.berkeley.edu/after-hours</a>.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Law enforcement</strong> &ndash; Contact law enforcement directly if you experience physical harm, direct threats or emergency situations.</p>

<p>Emergencies: 911</p>

<p>UCPD: police.berkeley.edu, (510) 642-3333</p>

<p>Berkeley Police Department: ci.berkeley.ca.us/police, (510) 981-5900.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Campus resources for students</u></strong>:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>University Health Counseling and Psychological Services: <a href="https://uhs.berkeley.edu/counseling">https://uhs.berkeley.edu/counseling</a> or 510) 642-9494, and an after-hours counseling line at (855) 817-5667</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Undocumented Student Program:&nbsp;<a href="http://undocu.berkeley.edu/">http://undocu.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Gender Equity Resource Center:&nbsp;<a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/geneq">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/geneq</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Student Legal Services: <a href="http://sa.berkeley.edu/legal/">http://sa.berkeley.edu/legal/</a> or (510) 642-3916</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>ASUC Student Advocate Office: <a href="https://advocate.berkeley.edu/">https://advocate.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Multicultural Community Center:&nbsp;<a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/mcc">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/mcc</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Center for Race and Gender:&nbsp;<a href="http://crg.berkeley.edu/">http://crg.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>African American Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/aasd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/aasd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Asian/Pacific American Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/apasd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/apasd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Chicanx/Latinx Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/clsd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/clsd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Native American Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/nasd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/nasd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Muslim Student Association: <a href="https://callink.berkeley.edu/organization/MSA">https://callink.berkeley.edu/organization/MSA</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Jewish Student Union: https://www.jsu.berkeley.edu/</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Student Organizations: <a href="http://lead.berkeley.edu/about-student-orgs/">http://lead.berkeley.edu/about-student-orgs/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Reporting and getting support in the event of an incident</u></strong><u>:</u></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Reporting incidents on campus: <u>stophate.berkeley.edu</u></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>UC Systemwide Intolerance Reporting Form: https://ucsystems.ethicspointvp.com/custom/ucs_ccc/</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>UCPD: 1 Sproul Hall,&nbsp;<a href="tel:510-642-6760">510-642-6760</a>, <a href="http://ucpd.berkeley.edu/">http://ucpd.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Office for the Prevention of Harassment and Discrimination: <a href="https://ophd.berkeley.edu/">https://ophd.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>(racially hostile environment, sexual harassment, and other violations)</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>National advocacy organizations: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/report-incident/hate-crimes-nao">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/report-incident/hate-crimes-nao</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Resources for faculty and staff</u></strong>:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Post-Election: What Educators Can Do to Support Undocumented Students: <u>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EGNrsdXF0j3CWoHp0i6np0K8xcoFvV22AlL8itwRFus/edit</u></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Faculty Resource List: Advancing Equity, Inclusion, and Diversity:</p>

<p><a href="https://campusclimate.berkeley.edu/faculty/resources"><strong>https://campusclimate.berkeley.edu/faculty/resources</strong></a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Staff Diversity Office: <a href="mailto:staffdiversity@berkeley.edu">staffdiversity@berkeley.edu</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Community resources</u></strong>:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>East Bay Sanctuary (EBS): <a href="https://eastbaysanctuary.org/">https://eastbaysanctuary.org/</a>, a long-standing partner of UC Berkeley students and their families in refugee and migrant application processing.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Immigration Legal Resource Center: <a href="https://www.ilrc.org/">https://www.ilrc.org/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>East Bay Community Law Center: <a href="https://ebclc.org/">https://ebclc.org/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Council on American Islamic Relations, SF Bay Area Chapter:&nbsp;<a href="https://ca.cair.com/sfba/" target="_blank">https://ca.cair.com/sfba/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Asian American Advancing Justice at Asian Law Caucus:&nbsp;<a href="http://www.advancingjustice-alc.org" target="_blank">http://www.advancingjustice-alc.org</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Berkeley Hillel: <a href="https://berkeleyhillel.org/">https://berkeleyhillel.org/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>ACLU: &nbsp;<a href="https://www.aclu.org/know-your-rights/what-do-if-youre-stopped-police-immigration-agents-or-fbi">https://www.aclu.org/know-your-rights/what-do-if-youre-stopped-police-immigration-agents-or-fbi</a>; <a href="http://unitedwedream.org/thank-deportation-defense-card-handy-phone/">http://unitedwedream.org/thank-deportation-defense-card-handy-phone/</a>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_3642291'-->
  </li>

  </ul>    
    <br>
<hr>
  <h3>Graduate Forms (pdfs)</h3>

  </ul>

      <div class="tight clearfix header">
  <header role="banner">
    <h1 class="sr-only">Department of Ethnic Studies - College of Letters and Science - University of California, Berkeley</h1>
    
    
      <div class="visible-xs link-back pull-right"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>
</div>
      <h2 class="text-left" aria-hidden="true"><a href="/"><span>The Department of </span> <span class="bigger bold">Ethnic Studies </span><span>UC Berkeley</span></a></h2>
    
  </header>
</div>

      <div id='main-content' class="main-content" role="main">
        <div class="row">
          <aside aria-label="Left Sidebar">
           <div class="col-md-3 col-sm-3 col-xs-12 sidebar-left">
            <div class="hidden-xs">
              

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>

                    </li>

          </aside>
          <div class="col-md-6 col-sm-8 col-xs-12 body-area">
            <section aria-label="Body">
            <div class="link-back hidden-xs"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>

            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3029581' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3029581'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Graduate</span></p>
<h1>Tuition and Financial Aid</h1>


</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3029581 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/grad/tuition-financial-aid'>Tuition and Financial Aid</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/resources'>Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>

          </li>
        </ul>
      
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  


              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3029579' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3029579 wv-inplace-rte'><p>To review the current year estimated cost of attendance, please go to the <a href="http://financialaid.berkeley.edu/#graduate">Financial Aid website</a> for complete details on student budgets:</p>

<p>Additionally, the Graduate Division has various resources.  Please review the links provided under the heading Financing a Berkeley Education. The Guide to Financial Support for Graduate Students, which youll find in the first link under the heading <a href="http://grad.berkeley.edu/admissions/choose-berkeley/">Financing a Berkeley Education</a> is especially important and relevant to anyone investigating how to fund their graduate education at Berkeley.  This guide will fully detail all funding options.</p>

<p>Also of particular importance is information on becoming a Graduate Student Instructor, Researcher or Reader, since these academic jobs often provide a generous tuition and fee remissions benefit. The Graduate Division has information on <a href="http://grad.berkeley.edu/financial/graduate-student-employment/">Teaching and Research Opportunities</a>.</p></div>
<!-- end code region pod_3029579 -->
            
            <div class="text-right hidden-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>

  <header role="banner">
    <h1 class="sr-only">Department of Ethnic Studies - College of Letters and Science - University of California, Berkeley</h1>

      <h2 class="text-left" aria-hidden="true"><a href="/"><span>The Department of </span> <span class="bigger bold">Ethnic Studies </span><span>UC Berkeley</span></a></h2>
    
  </header>

<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3216414 wv-inplace-rte'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Undergraduate</span></p>

<h1>About</h1>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3216414 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>

                    </li>

                    </li>

                    </li>

                    </li>

                    </li>

          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/tuition-financial-aid'>Tuition and Financial Aid</a>

          </li>

              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3216412' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3216412 wv-inplace-rte'><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:14px;"><span style="font-family: helvetica;">Ethnic Studies is the critical and interdisciplinary study of race, ethnicity, and indigeneity <span style="font-family: helvetica;">with a focus on the experiences and perspectives of people of color</span> within and beyond the United States<span style="font-family: helvetica;">. </span>Since the emergence of ethnic studies as an academic field in the late 1960s, scholars have analyzed the ways in which race and racism have been, and continue to be, powerful social, cultural, and political forces and their connections to other axes of stratification, including gender, class, sexuality, and legal status.&nbsp; The <a href="http://ethnicstudies.webvanta.com/about/history">Department of Ethnic Studies at UC Berkeley</a> was one of the first in the nation and has produced some of the most dynamic and influential scholarship in the field.&nbsp; We offer undergraduate majors and minors in <a href="http://ethnicstudies.webvanta.com/areas-of-study/area/asian-studies">Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a>, <a href="http://ethnicstudies.webvanta.com/areas-of-study/area/chicano-latino-studies">Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a>, <a href="http://ethnicstudies.webvanta.com/areas-of-study/area/native-american-studies">Native American Studies</a>, and <a href="http://ethnicstudies.webvanta.com/areas-of-study/area/ethnic-studies">Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></span>.</span></p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3216412 -->
            
            <div class="text-right hidden-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>
            </section>
          </div>

            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3422836' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3422836 wv-inplace-rte'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Undergraduate</span></p>

<h1>Advising</h1>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3422836 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>

                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>

                    </li>

          </li>

        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>

            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3422834' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3422834 wv-inplace-rte'><p style="text-align: justify;">Students who are interested in declaring an Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies, Chicano Studies, Ethnic Studies or Native American Studies major or minor, or who wish to obtain information about any of these majors or minors, should consult with one of the Undergraduate Major Advisors in the department.</p>

<h2 style="text-align: justify;">UNDERGRADUATE MAJOR ADVISORS:</h2>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Laura Jimenez-Olvera<br />
<a href="mailto:lauraj@berkeley.edu">lauraj@berkeley.edu</a><br />
510-642-0243<br />
532 Barrows Hall<br />
Advising Hours: Monday, Thursday &amp; Friday: 9:30-11:30am &amp; 1:30-4:30pm, Tuesday: 9:30-11:30am &amp; 1:30-2:30pm or By Appointment. (Note: Laura is not on campus on Wednesdays)</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Dewey St. Germaine<br />
<a href="mailto:deweystg@berkeley.edu">deweystg@berkeley.edu</a><br />
510-643-6420<br />
530 Barrows Hall<br />
Advising Hours: Monday-Friday: 9:30-11:30am &amp; 1:30-4:30pm or By Appointment.</p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3422834 -->

            <section aria-label="Body">
            <div class="body-area">
              <div class="link-back hidden-xs"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>

              <div class="body-head">
                <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166594' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166594'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Undergraduate</span></p>
<h1>Careers in Ethnic Studies</h1></div>
<!-- end code region pod_3166594 -->
              </div>
              <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
                <div class="mobile-left">
                  

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>

                    </li>

          </li>

                </div>
              </div>
                <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166592' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166592 wv-inplace-rte'><h3 style="text-align: justify;">What Can You Do with a Major in Ethnic Studies, Asian American Studies, Chicano Studies, or Native American Studies?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Choosing a major is not the same as choosing a career. It is one step in a process that may lead to a number of different career options. Most majors do not directly correlate to specific occupations. Instead, choosing a major allows you to pursue your interests and develop skills that are transferable to a variety of career fields.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">One way to begin thinking about your choice of major is by addressing the following questions:</p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">What is the focus of this major?</li>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">What skills will I develop in this major?</li>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">What are some of the most popular career options for graduates with this major?</li>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">What other resources are available to help me with this decision?</li>
</ul>

<h3 style="text-align: justify;">Intellectual focus of the Ethnic Studies, Asian American Studies, Chicano/Latino Studies, and Native American Studies majors at Cal</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Each major provides a curriculum that critically examines the historical and contemporary experiences of minority groups in the context of U.S. society and institutions. Each major stresses the analysis of the interrelationships in the historical background, cultural patterns, and artistic expressions of each community in order to acquire a well-rounded, in-depth understanding of the contemporary interface between Asian American, Chicano/Latino, and Native Americans and U.S. society. Each major is interdisciplinary in nature and strives to incorporate various disciplines, such as anthropology, art, education, history, law, literary criticism, political science, public policy, and sociology, in its approach.</p>

<h3 style="text-align: justify;">Related Skills</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In completing work for the bachelor&rsquo;s degree, students in each major acquire and sharpen skills similar to those of other liberal arts majors in the humanities and social sciences. For example, they develop and refine skills in creative and critical thinking, and in analyzing, researching, and understanding people and institutions in different communities and cultures. They also develop and refine skills through well-analyzed and clearly written papers.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Students in each major are encouraged to consider minors in fields that will enhance those skills and add to their overall breadth of knowledge. Minors include those in City &amp; Regional Planning, Creative Writing, Education, English, Gender &amp; Women&rsquo;s Studies, Geography, and Public Policy.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Majors are also encouraged to develop or enhance their skills in speaking and writing in another language. Acquiring internship and/or volunteer experience is highly encouraged for majors. These opportunities can help students acquire important experience for graduate or professional school and assist with career exploration and developing skills that are desirable in a number of different careers.</p>

<h3 style="text-align: justify;">Career Options</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">One popular career option for majors is teaching, either in colleges and universities or secondary schools at the K-12 level. Another career option is in the counseling (clinical, career, or academic) field. A career in law can make good use of the major&#39;s specialized knowledge of underrepresented communities. That knowledge is also useful in many different careers, such as: journalism, marketing, community and housing development, radio and television, health and medicine, community and union organizing, social work, and a wide variety of positions in federal, state, and local governments as well as those at the city and county levels.</p>

<h3 style="text-align: justify;">Graduate and Professional School Options</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">There are a number of colleges and universities that offer master&rsquo;s and Ph.D. programs in Asian American, Chicano, Ethnic and Native American Studies. Accordingly, persons who seek careers in college and university teaching should acquire at least a master&#39;s degree and preferably a Ph.D. ES graduates who desire legal careers should go on to law school and obtain a J.D. degree. Another option is obtaining a degree of M.P.P. (Master of Public Policy) for those seeking careers in economic or community development and policy making. Those who seek careers in counseling should also seek at least the M.A/M.S. degree. The degree of M.S.W. (Master of Social Work) is highly desirable for those seeking a career in social work and an M.P.H. (Master of Public Health) for those interested in the health field.</p>

<h3 style="text-align: justify;">Career Resources at Cal</h3>

<h4 style="text-align: justify;">Career &amp; Educational Guidance Library</h4>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The <a href="http://www.uhs.berkeley.edu/students/careerlibrary/index.shtml">Career &amp; Educational Guidance Library</a> at 2220 Bancroft Way (next to the University Health Services Tang Center) has an extensive collection of books, articles, and other publications that can help you explore majors and related career fields.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Career &amp; Educational Guidance Library also offers two computer-assisted career guidance systems (My Road and EUREKA) that can help you assess your interests, skills, and values, and identify major and career options.</p>

<h4 style="text-align: justify;">Career Center</h4>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The <a href="https://career.berkeley.edu/">Career Center</a> located at 2111 Bancroft Way also has an extensive collection of publications and services that can help you explore different majors, various career fields and assist with internship and employment opportunities.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Career Center also offers services related to graduate and professional schools. These services include: graduate school fairs, application workshops, letter service, and personal statement reviews.</p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3166592 -->

      <div class="tight clearfix header">
  <header role="banner">
    <h1 class="sr-only">Department of Ethnic Studies - College of Letters and Science - University of California, Berkeley</h1>
    
    
      <div class="visible-xs link-back pull-right"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>
</div>
      <h2 class="text-left" aria-hidden="true"><a href="/"><span>The Department of </span> <span class="bigger bold">Ethnic Studies </span><span>UC Berkeley</span></a></h2>
    
  </header>
</div>

      <div id='main-content' class="main-content" role="main">
        <div class="row">
          <aside aria-label="Left Sidebar">
           <div class="col-md-3 col-sm-3 col-xs-12 sidebar-left">
            <div class="hidden-xs">
              

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>

                    </li>

          </li>
        </ul>
      
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  


            </div>
            <div class="visible-sm sidebar-right-sm">

          </aside>
          <div class="col-md-6 col-sm-8 col-xs-12 body-area">
            <section aria-label="Body">

            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166393' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166393'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Undergraduate</span></p>
<h1>Internships</h1>


</div>

            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>

              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166391' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166391 wv-inplace-rte'><p style="text-align: justify;">All students in the department are required to satisfy four units of 197 field study (180 hours total) in their respective major doing community service work with organizations and programs that engage and support underrepresented communities on-campus and in the surrounding community. The idea is that students can apply and further enrich their knowledge of the study of communities of color and the qualitative appreciation of their agency and varied productions.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Below are some of the volunteer and internship sites that previous majors have used to fulfill their 197 field study requirement.</p>

<h2>ON-CAMPUS:</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Center for Race &amp; Gender</li>
	<li>UC Berkeley Labor Center</li>
	<li>Gender &amp; Equity Resource Center</li>
	<li>Educational Opportunity Program</li>
	<li>Transfer, Re-entry, Student Parent Program</li>
	<li>Starting Point Mentorship Program</li>
	<li>Cross Cultural Student Development</li>
	<li>Asian Pacific American Student Development</li>
	<li>Chicano/Latino Student Development</li>
	<li>Native American Student Development</li>
	<li>Office of Equity &amp; Inclusion</li>
	<li>Multicultural Immigrant Student Program</li>
	<li>Undocumented Student Program</li>
	<li>bridges</li>
	<li>REACH!</li>
	<li>Raza Recruitment &amp; Retention Center</li>
	<li>Black Recruitment &amp; Retention Center</li>
	<li>Native American Recruitment &amp; Retention Center</li>
	<li>Center for Latin American Studies</li>
	<li>Center for Latino Policy Research</li>
	<li>Upward Bound</li>
	<li>Biology Scholars Program</li>
	<li>Southeast Asian Mentorship Program</li>
	<li>hardboiled</li>
	<li>Pilipino Academic Student Services</li>
	<li>Pilipino Academic Student Services Youth Mentorship</li>
	<li>maganda magazine</li>
	<li>Korean American Tutoring &amp; Mentoring Program</li>
	<li>Joseph A. Myers Center for Research on Native American Issues</li>
</ul>

<h2>OFF-CAMPUS:</h2>

<ul>
	<li>East Bay Sanctuary Covenant</li>
	<li>Office of Congresswoman Barbara Lee</li>
	<li>Office of State Senator Loni Hancock</li>
	<li>YMCA Berkeley Y-Scholars Program</li>
	<li>B-Tech Academy</li>
	<li>East Bay Consortium</li>
	<li>Centro Legal de la Raza</li>
	<li>Mission Cultural Center for Latino Arts</li>
	<li>Asian Art Museum of San Francisco</li>
	<li>Oakland Museum</li>
	<li>La Pena Cultural Center</li>
	<li>Asian Immigrant Women Advocates</li>
	<li>Prospera</li>
	<li>Asian Health Services</li>
	<li>Native American Health Center</li>
	<li>La Clinica de la Raza</li>
	<li>Street Level Health Project</li>
	<li>American Indian Child Resource Center</li>
	<li>Korean Community Center of the East Bay</li>
	<li>Oakland Asian Students Educational Services</li>
	<li>YWCA of Berkeley</li>
	<li>Berkeley Free Clinic</li>
	<li>Suitcase Clinic</li>
	<li>Justice Now</li>
	<li>Justice Corp</li>
	<li>Legal Services for Prisoners with Children</li>
	<li>College Track</li>
	<li>Oakland Pretrial Services</li>
	<li>Berkeley Organizing Congregations for Action</li>
	<li>Spanish Speaking Citizens Foundation</li>
	<li>Resources for Community Development</li>
	<li>California Peace Action</li>
	<li>Japanese American Citizens League</li>
	<li>National Network for Immigrant and Refugee Rights</li>
	<li>Center on Juvenile and Criminal Justice</li>
	<li>Merritt College Puente Project</li>
	<li>East Bay Asian Youth Center</li>
	<li>Contra Costa College Puente Project</li>
	<li>The Women&#39;s Building</li>
	<li>Pinoy Educational Partnerships</li>
	<li>Friends of Port Chicago</li>
	<li>Asian Women&#39;s Shelter</li>
	<li>Native American Aids Project</li>
	<li>The People&#39;s Grocery</li>
	<li>Youth Radio</li>
	<li>Asian American Psychological Services</li>
	<li>Children&#39;s Hospital of Oakland</li>
	<li>International Pediatrics</li>
	<li>AsianWeek</li>
	<li>Greenlining Institute</li>
	<li>Asian Family Resource Center</li>
	<li>Youth Alive</li>
	<li>International Latino Film Festival</li>
	<li>American Indian Film Institute</li>
	<li>Asian American Film Festival</li>
	<li>Center for Asian American Media</li>
	<li>Asian American Law Caucus</li>
	<li>California Coalition for Civil Rights</li>
	<li>American Civil Liberties Union of Northern California</li>
	<li>Numerous K-12 Bay Area Schools (also through the School of Education)</li>
</ul>
</div>

    <div class="container main-container">
    <a id="to-top"></a>
      <div class="tight clearfix header">
  <header role="banner">
    <h1 class="sr-only">Department of Ethnic Studies - College of Letters and Science - University of California, Berkeley</h1>

<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3459683'><h1>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies Major Requirements</h1>

</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3459683 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">

            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3459681' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3459681 wv-inplace-rte'><h2>Lower Division (4 courses)</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Asian American Studies 20A</li>
	<li>Asian American Studies 20AC&nbsp;or 20C</li>
	<li>Two courses from the following: Ethnic Studies 10AC, 11AC, 20AC, 21AC or 41AC</li>
</ul>

<h2>Upper Division (8 courses)</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Asian American Studies 131</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 101A or Ethnic Studies 101B</li>
	<li>Asian American Studies 197 (4 units total)</li>
	<li>Completion of one course from each group below:
	<ul>
		<li>Group 1 (History): 121, 122, 123, 124, 126, 127, 128AC</li>
		<li>Group 2 (Community Studies): 125, 132AC, 141, 143AC, 144, 145AC, 146, 150, 151AC, 165</li>
		<li>Group 3 (Cultural Studies): 138, 171, 172, 173, 175, 176, 177, 178, 180, 181, 183</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Two additional electives that can be satisfied with related courses from outside departments (i.e., Asian Studies, East Asian Languages &amp; Cultures, History, South &amp; Southeast Asian Studies), Asian language courses, EAP courses from an Asian university, or related coursework from other UC Campuses</li>
</ul>

<h2>Honors</h2>

<p>The Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies Program will provide a program leading to the B.A. degree with honors. A student will be recommended for honors if the student has completed at least 30 units and two semesters with a grade-point average of at least 3.5 overall and for all work undertaken in the Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies Program. Students must also have been approved specifically for honors by the Ethnic Studies Department chair and the Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies Vice Chair upon the recommendation by the faculty adviser for the major. The honors student will be required to complete H195A-B Senior Honors Seminar for Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies Majors. In order to graduate with a B.A. degree with honors, a student must obtain at least 3.5 GPA for all course work undertaken at the university.</p>

<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

<h2><span style="font-size:28px;">Minor Requirements</span></h2>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- All courses taken for the Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies Minor must be taken for a letter grade</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- An overall GPA of 2.0 is required for all courses applied to the minor program</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- At least three of the courses must be completed at U.C. Berkeley</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- Only one course can be used to overlap between major(s) and minor requirements</span></p>

<h1 align="left"><span style="font-size:20px;"><span style="font-family: helvetica;"><strong>Upper Division (5 Courses)</strong></span></span></h1>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;"><u>Five courses</u> from: Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies 121, 122, 123, 124, 125, 126, 127, 128AC, 131, 132AC, 138, 141, 143AC, 144, 145AC, 146, 150, 151AC, 165, 171, 172, 173, 175, 176, 178, 181, 183, 190</span></p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3459681 -->

                          </li>
                        

                      </ul>     
                    </li>
                  

                
              </ul>
            
            <form action="/search" id="search_form" method="post" class="navbar-form navbar-right" role="search">
              <div class="form-group" id="search">

          </div>
        </div>
      </nav>
    </div>

  </div>
</div>

    <div class="container main-container">

  <header role="banner">

</div>
      <h2 class="text-left" aria-hidden="true"><a href="/"><span>The Department of </span> <span class="bigger bold">Ethnic Studies </span><span>UC Berkeley</span></a></h2>
    
  </header>
</div>

            <section aria-label="Body">
            <div class="link-back hidden-xs"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>

            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3381840' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3381840'><h1>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies Major Requirements</h1>

</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3381840 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/tuition-financial-aid'>Tuition and Financial Aid</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/resources'>Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/international'>International</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  


              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3381838' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3381838 wv-inplace-rte'><h2>Lower Division (4 courses):</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 10AC</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 11AC</li>
	<li>Completion of two additional elective courses from Chicano Studies 20, 40, 50, or 70</li>
</ul>

<h2>Upper Division (8 courses):</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 101A &amp; 101B</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 103</li>
	<li>Completion of four elective courses from Chicano Studies 110, 130, 133, 135A, 135B, 135C, 141, 142, 143, 148, 149, 150A, 150B, 152, 159, 161, 163, 165, 172, 174, 176, 179, 180, 180AC, or an approved course from EAP or another department</li>
	<li>Chicano Studies 197 (4 units total)</li>
</ul>

<h2>Honors Program</h2>

<p>The Chicano Studies program provides an option leading to the B.A. degree with honors. Students must have senior standing; a 3.5 University GPA; and a 3.5 GPA in the major. The honors thesis consists of a 6-unit research project (Chicano Studies H195A &amp; H195B). The faculty will establish criteria and grade the project. For more information, see the Chicano Studies adviser in 532 Barrows Hall.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style="font-size:28px;">Minor Requirements</span></h2>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- All courses taken for the Chicano Studies Minor must be taken for a letter grade</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- An overall GPA of 2.0 is required for all courses applied to the minor program</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- At least three of the courses must be completed at U.C. Berkeley</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;">- Only one course can be used to overlap between major(s) and minor requirements</span></p>

<h2><span style="font-size:20px;">Upper Division (5 Courses)</span></h2>

<p><span style="font-family:helvetica;"><u>Five courses</u> from: Chicano Studies 110, 130, 133, 135A, 135B, 135C, 141, 142, 143, 148, 149, 150A, 150B, 152,&nbsp;159, 161, 163, 165,&nbsp;172, 174, 176, 179, 180, 180AC (Note: Students may also use one approved course from EAP or another department)</span></p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3381838 -->
            
            <div class="text-right hidden-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>
            </section>
          </div>

                            <a href='/resources/student-resources-services'>Student Resources & Services</a>
                          </li>
                        
                          
                          <li class="">
                            <a href='/resources/visiting-scholars'>Visiting Scholars Program</a>
                          </li>
                        

                      </ul>     
                    </li>
                  

                
              </ul>

            <section aria-label="Body">

            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3459986' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3459986'><h1>Comparative Ethnic Studies Major Requirements</h1>
<h2>(for majors declared as of Fall 2016)</h2>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3459986 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/tuition-financial-aid'>Tuition and Financial Aid</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/resources'>Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/international'>International</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  


              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3459984' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3459984 wv-inplace-rte'><h2>Lower Division (4&nbsp;courses)</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 10AC</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 11AC</li>
	<li>Completion of two&nbsp;additional elective courses&nbsp;from either: African American Studies, Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies, Chicano Studies, Ethnic Studies, Gender and Women&rsquo;s Studies, Native American Studies, or ethnic studies related courses from other departments (i.e., English, Geography, Sociology)</li>
</ul>

<h2>Upper Division (8&nbsp;courses)</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 101A &amp; 101B</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 190 or&nbsp;190AC</li>
	<li>Completion of two&nbsp;elective courses from Ethnic Studies 100, 103A, 103B, 103C, 103D, 103E, 122AC, C126, 130, 135, 136, 141, 144AC, 145, 147AC, 150, 159AC, 173AC, 174, 175, 176, 180, N180, 181AC, 182AC, 190, or 190AC</li>
	<li>Completion of two additional elective courses from either: African American Studies, Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies, Chicano Studies, Ethnic Studies, Gender and Women&rsquo;s Studies, Native American Studies, ethnic studies related courses from other departments, or approved EAP courses. (Note: elective courses do not have to be from the same program/department)</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 197 (4 units total)</li>
</ul>

<h2>Honors Program</h2>

<p>The Department of Ethnic Studies provides a program leading to the B.A. degree with honors. Students will be recommended for honors if they have completed at least 30 units and two semesters with an average GPA of at least 3.5 overall and for all work undertaken in the Department of Ethnic Studies. Students must also have been approved specifically for honors by the department chair upon recommendation by the faculty advisor for the group major. Honors students will be required to complete Ethnic Studies H196A-B, Senior Honors Seminar for Ethnic Studies Majors. In order to graduate with an B.A. degree with honors, students must obtain at least a 3.5 GPA for all course work undertaken at the University.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style="font-size:28px;">Minor Requirements</span></h2>

<p>- All courses taken for the Ethnic Studies Minor must be taken for a letter grade</p>

<p>- An overall GPA of 2.0 is required for all courses applied to the minor program</p>

<p>- At least three of the courses must be completed at U.C. Berkeley</p>

<p>- Only one course can be used to overlap between major(s) and minor requirements</p>

<h2><span style="font-size:20px;">Upper Division (5 Courses)</span></h2>

<p><u>Three courses</u> from: Ethnic Studies 100, 101A, 101B, 103A, 103B, 103C, 103D, 103E, 122AC, C126, 130, 135, 136, 144AC, 145,&nbsp;147AC, 150, 159AC, 173AC, 174, 175, 176, 180, N180, 181AC, 182AC, 190, 190AC</p>

<p><u>Two courses</u> from either: African American Studies, Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies, Chicano Studies, Native American Studies, ethnic studies related courses from other departments or approved EAP courses. (<strong>NOTE</strong>: courses do not have to be from the same program/department)</p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3459984 -->
            
            <div class="text-right hidden-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>
            </section>
          </div>

      <h2 class="text-left" aria-hidden="true"><a href="/"><span>The Department of </span> <span class="bigger bold">Ethnic Studies </span><span>UC Berkeley</span></a></h2>
    
  </header>

            <section aria-label="Body">
