            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3182986' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3182986'><h1>Native American Studies Major Requirements</h1></div>
<!-- end code region pod_3182986 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/tuition-financial-aid'>Tuition and Financial Aid</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>

            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3182984' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3182984 wv-inplace-rte'><h2>Lower Division (4 courses):</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Native American Studies 20A</li>
	<li>Native American Studies 20B</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 10AC</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 11AC</li>
</ul>

<h2>Upper Division (8 courses):</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Ethnic Studies: 101A &amp; 101B</li>
	<li>Ethnic Studies 103</li>
	<li>Native American Studies 110</li>
	<li>Completion of three elective courses from Native American Studies 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 120, 120AC, 145, 149, 150, 151, C152, 158, 173AC, 175, 176, 177, 178, 178AC, 179, 182, 190</li>
	<li>Native American Studies 197 (4 units total)</li>
</ul>

<h2>Honors Program</h2>

<p>The Native American Studies Program provides a program leading to the B.A. degree with honors. A student must have senior standing; a 3.5 GPA overall; and 3.5 GPA in the major. To complete the degree with honors the student will be required to undertake a 6-unit research project (NATAMST H195A &amp; H195B) and will be graded according to standards determined by the faculty advisor as being of honors quality.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style="font-size:28px;">Minor Requirements</span></h2>

<p>- All courses taken for the Native American Studies Minor must be taken for a letter grade</p>

<p>- An overall GPA of 2.0 is required for all courses applied to the minor program</p>

<p>- At least three of the courses must be completed at U.C. Berkeley</p>

<p>- Only one course can be used to overlap between major(s) and minor requirements</p>

<h2><span style="font-size:20px;">Upper Division (5 Courses)</span></h2>

<p align="left">Native American Studies 110</p>

<p><u>Four courses</u> from: Native American Studies 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 120, 120AC, 145, 149, 150, 151, C152, 158, 173AC, 175, 176, 177, 178, 178AC, 179, 182, 190</p>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3182984 -->
            
            <div class="text-right hidden-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>
            </section>
          </div>

                      <a href='#' data-toggle="dropdown" class="dropdown-toggle">News & Events<b class="caret" aria-hidden="true"></b></a>
                      <ul class="dropdown-menu">

                      </ul>     
                    </li>
                  

                
                  
                  
                    <li class="dropdown ">
                      <a href='#' data-toggle="dropdown" class="dropdown-toggle">Resources<b class="caret" aria-hidden="true"></b></a>
                      <ul class="dropdown-menu">

    <div class="container main-container">
    <a id="to-top"></a>
      <div class="tight clearfix header">
  <header role="banner">
    <h1 class="sr-only">Department of Ethnic Studies - College of Letters and Science - University of California, Berkeley</h1>
    
    
      <div class="visible-xs link-back pull-right"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>
</div>
      <h2 class="text-left" aria-hidden="true"><a href="/"><span>The Department of </span> <span class="bigger bold">Ethnic Studies </span><span>UC Berkeley</span></a></h2>
    
  </header>

      <div id='main-content' class="main-content" role="main">

<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3170282 wv-inplace-rte'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Undergraduate</span></p>

<h1>Resources &amp; Forms</h1>

<!-- end code region pod_3170280 -->
            <div class="resource-list">
<hr>
  <h3>Undergraduate Resources</h3>

<ul class="list-unstyled">
  
  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632289'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632289' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://ls.berkeley.edu/undergraduates">Letters and Science Undergraduate Advising &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://ls.berkeley.edu/undergraduates">ls.berkeley.edu/undergraduates</a></p>
  <p>For questions about transfer units, University requirements, exception petitions and more, the office of Undergraduate Advising for Letters &amp; Science (L &amp; S) is located at 206 Evans Hall.</p>
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632289'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632290'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632290' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://ls-advise.berkeley.edu/fp/fp.html">Letters and Science Forms &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://ls-advise.berkeley.edu/fp/fp.html">ls-advise.berkeley.edu/fp/fp.html</a></p>
  
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632290'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632291'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632291' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://ls-advise.berkeley.edu/graduation/graduation.html">Graduation Eligibility &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://ls-advise.berkeley.edu/graduation/graduation.html">ls-advise.berkeley.edu/graduation/graduation.html</a></p>
  
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632291'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632292'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632292' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://research.berkeley.edu/">Research Opportunities for Undergraduates &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://research.berkeley.edu/">research.berkeley.edu/</a></p>
  
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632292'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632293'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632293' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://studyabroad.berkeley.edu/">Study Abroad &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://studyabroad.berkeley.edu/">studyabroad.berkeley.edu/</a></p>
  <p>With approval of course syllabi, students may apply up to two courses toward major electives.<span style="mso-spacerun:yes">&nbsp; </span>Consider your study abroad options!</p>
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632293'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632294'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632294' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://studentcentral.berkeley.edu/">CAL Student Central &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://studentcentral.berkeley.edu/">studentcentral.berkeley.edu/</a></p>
  <p>For questions about financial aid, registration blocks, and more, visit CAL Student Central</p>

    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632294'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_2632295'--> <div id='kdb_id_2632295' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="http://internationaloffice.berkeley.edu/">Information for International Students &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href="http://internationaloffice.berkeley.edu/">internationaloffice.berkeley.edu/</a></p>
  
    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_2632295'-->
  </li>

  <li>
    <!-- begin edit region 'kdb_id_3642291'--> <div id='kdb_id_3642291' class='kb_type_dynode wv-edit-region '>
      <p class="h5" style="margin-bottom:0;"><a target="_blank" href="">Resources Compiled by the Ethnic Studies Department  &nbsp;&nbsp;<button class="btn btn-color btn-sm btn-square" aria-label="Go to page"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right"></span></button></a></p><p><a href=""></a></p>
  <p><strong>Medical emergencies &ndash; </strong>For life-threatening emergencies, call 911.</p>

<p><strong>Medical care (non-emergency) &ndash; </strong>University Health Service&rsquo;s urgent care hours are Saturday, 9:30 a.m. to 5 p.m., and Sunday, 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. For after-hours care: <a href="https://uhs.berkeley.edu/after-hours">uhs.berkeley.edu/after-hours</a>.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Law enforcement</strong> &ndash; Contact law enforcement directly if you experience physical harm, direct threats or emergency situations.</p>

<p>Emergencies: 911</p>

<p>UCPD: police.berkeley.edu, (510) 642-3333</p>

<p>Berkeley Police Department: ci.berkeley.ca.us/police, (510) 981-5900.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Campus resources for students</u></strong>:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>University Health Counseling and Psychological Services: <a href="https://uhs.berkeley.edu/counseling">https://uhs.berkeley.edu/counseling</a> or 510) 642-9494, and an after-hours counseling line at (855) 817-5667</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Undocumented Student Program:&nbsp;<a href="http://undocu.berkeley.edu/">http://undocu.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Gender Equity Resource Center:&nbsp;<a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/geneq">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/geneq</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Student Legal Services: <a href="http://sa.berkeley.edu/legal/">http://sa.berkeley.edu/legal/</a> or (510) 642-3916</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>ASUC Student Advocate Office: <a href="https://advocate.berkeley.edu/">https://advocate.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Multicultural Community Center:&nbsp;<a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/mcc">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/mcc</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Center for Race and Gender:&nbsp;<a href="http://crg.berkeley.edu/">http://crg.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>African American Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/aasd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/aasd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Asian/Pacific American Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/apasd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/apasd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Chicanx/Latinx Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/clsd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/clsd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Native American Student Development: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/nasd">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/nasd</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Muslim Student Association: <a href="https://callink.berkeley.edu/organization/MSA">https://callink.berkeley.edu/organization/MSA</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Jewish Student Union: https://www.jsu.berkeley.edu/</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Student Organizations: <a href="http://lead.berkeley.edu/about-student-orgs/">http://lead.berkeley.edu/about-student-orgs/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Reporting and getting support in the event of an incident</u></strong><u>:</u></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Reporting incidents on campus: <u>stophate.berkeley.edu</u></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>UC Systemwide Intolerance Reporting Form: https://ucsystems.ethicspointvp.com/custom/ucs_ccc/</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>UCPD: 1 Sproul Hall,&nbsp;<a href="tel:510-642-6760">510-642-6760</a>, <a href="http://ucpd.berkeley.edu/">http://ucpd.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Office for the Prevention of Harassment and Discrimination: <a href="https://ophd.berkeley.edu/">https://ophd.berkeley.edu/</a></p>

<p>(racially hostile environment, sexual harassment, and other violations)</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>National advocacy organizations: <a href="http://ejce.berkeley.edu/report-incident/hate-crimes-nao">http://ejce.berkeley.edu/report-incident/hate-crimes-nao</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Resources for faculty and staff</u></strong>:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Post-Election: What Educators Can Do to Support Undocumented Students: <u>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EGNrsdXF0j3CWoHp0i6np0K8xcoFvV22AlL8itwRFus/edit</u></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Faculty Resource List: Advancing Equity, Inclusion, and Diversity:</p>

<p><a href="https://campusclimate.berkeley.edu/faculty/resources"><strong>https://campusclimate.berkeley.edu/faculty/resources</strong></a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Staff Diversity Office: <a href="mailto:staffdiversity@berkeley.edu">staffdiversity@berkeley.edu</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Community resources</u></strong>:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>East Bay Sanctuary (EBS): <a href="https://eastbaysanctuary.org/">https://eastbaysanctuary.org/</a>, a long-standing partner of UC Berkeley students and their families in refugee and migrant application processing.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Immigration Legal Resource Center: <a href="https://www.ilrc.org/">https://www.ilrc.org/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>East Bay Community Law Center: <a href="https://ebclc.org/">https://ebclc.org/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Council on American Islamic Relations, SF Bay Area Chapter:&nbsp;<a href="https://ca.cair.com/sfba/" target="_blank">https://ca.cair.com/sfba/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Asian American Advancing Justice at Asian Law Caucus:&nbsp;<a href="http://www.advancingjustice-alc.org" target="_blank">http://www.advancingjustice-alc.org</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Berkeley Hillel: <a href="https://berkeleyhillel.org/">https://berkeleyhillel.org/</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>ACLU: &nbsp;<a href="https://www.aclu.org/know-your-rights/what-do-if-youre-stopped-police-immigration-agents-or-fbi">https://www.aclu.org/know-your-rights/what-do-if-youre-stopped-police-immigration-agents-or-fbi</a>; <a href="http://unitedwedream.org/thank-deportation-defense-card-handy-phone/">http://unitedwedream.org/thank-deportation-defense-card-handy-phone/</a>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

    </div> <!-- end edit region 'kdb_id_3642291'-->
  </li>

  </ul>

        <br>
        <span class="tel" style="display:inline-block">PH: 510-643-0796</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="tel" style="display:inline-block">FAX: 510-642-6456</span>
        <br>
        <span class="email"><a href="mailto:ethnicst@berkeley.edu">ethnicst@berkeley.edu</a></span>
      </li>
    </ul>

    <h1 class="sr-only">Department of Ethnic Studies - College of Letters and Science - University of California, Berkeley</h1>

      <h2 class="text-left" aria-hidden="true"><a href="/"><span>The Department of </span> <span class="bigger bold">Ethnic Studies </span><span>UC Berkeley</span></a></h2>
    
  </header>
</div>

      <div id='main-content' class="main-content" role="main">
        <div class="row">
          <aside aria-label="Left Sidebar">
           <div class="col-md-3 col-sm-3 col-xs-12 sidebar-left">

          <div class="col-md-6 col-sm-8 col-xs-12 body-area">
            <section aria-label="Body">
            <div class="link-back hidden-xs"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="javascript:history.back()"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-left"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous Page</span></a>
</div>
            <div class="body-head">
              <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166668' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166668'><p class="h2">Programs <span>/ Undergraduate</span></p>
<h1>Student Learning Outcomes</h1>


</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3166668 -->
            </div>
            <div class="visible-xs clearfix tight">
              <div class="mobile-left">
                

  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav active-sidenav">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/undergrad">Undergraduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='#'>Major and Minor Requirements</a>
              
                       
                		<ul class="subnav active-subnav list-unstyled">
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/comparative-ethnic-studies-major'>Comparative Ethnic Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/asian-american-asian-diaspora-studies-major'>Asian American and Asian Diaspora Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/chicano-latino-studies-major'>Chicana/o and Latina/o Studies</a></li>
                  			
                    			<li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/major-requirements/native-american-studies-major'>Native American Studies</a></li>
                  			
                		</ul>
           			 
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/internships'>Internships</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="active" href='/programs/undergrad/student-learning-outcomes'>Student Learning Outcomes</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/resources'>Undergraduate Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/advising'>Advising</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/undergrad/careers'>Careers in Ethnic Studies</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
        <ul class="list-unstyled sidenav ">
          <li class="parent-link"><a href="/programs/grad">Graduate Program</a>
            
            
                <ul class="subnav  list-unstyled">
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad'>About</a></li>
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/admissions'>Graduate Admissions</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/tuition-financial-aid'>Tuition and Financial Aid</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/resources'>Resources & Forms</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                    <li class="sidenav-link"><a  class="" href='/programs/grad/international'>International</a>
              
                       
                   
                    </li>                    
                  
                </ul>
            
          </li>
        </ul>
      
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
    
  


              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- begin code region 'pod_3166666' -->
<div class=' wv-code-region-pod_3166666 wv-inplace-rte'><p style="text-align: justify;">All undergraduate majors in the department are expected to obtain the following skills by the time they graduate. These skills belong to five different general areas: historical knowledge, empirical knowledge and quantitative methods, interpretation and qualitative analysis, theory and critique, and community service. They are:</p>

<ol>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">Historical Knowledge
	<ul>
		<li>Familiarity with the history of modern Western civilization, including European expansion, conquest, and enslavement.</li>
		<li>Specific knowledge of the modern history of at least three different ethno-racial groups.</li>
		<li>Acquaintance with debates in historiography, particularly as they relate to the use of history in relation to the understanding of people of color.</li>
		<li>For students who specialize in history, proper use of primary and secondary historical sources, as well as the writing of scholarly historical work.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">Empirical Knowledge and Quantitative Methods
	<ul>
		<li>Familiarity with different methods of gathering empirical data about human communities (anthropological, sociological, etc.).</li>
		<li>Knowledge of critical debates about the use and implications of traditional methods of gathering empirical data to obtain knowledge about communities of color.</li>
		<li>Identification of proper methods to conduct research, and awareness of the limits and possibilities of such methods.</li>
		<li>Creative use, delimitation, and expansion of methods of empirical and quantitative study based on the nature of the problems and questions addressed in the research as well as the object of study.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">Interpretation and Qualitative Analysis
	<ul>
		<li>Acquaintance with major methods and debates in the humanities.</li>
		<li>Familiarity with the art, film, literature, or music of at least three different ethno-racial groups.</li>
		<li>Identification of proper methods to conduct research about the creative products of human communities, and ethno-racial communities in particular.</li>
		<li>Creative use, delimitation, and expansion of methods of qualitative analysis based on the nature of the problems and questions addressed in the research as well as the object of study.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align: justify;">Theory and Critique
	<ul>
		<li>Familiarity with major theories of race and ethnicity, and their intersections and constitutive relations with class, gender, and sexuality.</li>
		<li>Acquaintance with theories of space and place, including indigeneity, Diaspora, migration, and nation, as well as their use in determining the unit of analysis.</li>
		<li>Use of comparison and contrast for evaluating and producing theory as well as for critical analysis.</li>
		<li>Creative use of philosophies and theories that are relevant to the understanding and critical analysis of the social contexts, interpersonal dynamics, and multiple creative productions of ethno-racial communities. 5. Service Learning</li>
		<li>Further refinement and enrichment of the above listed skills in settings where the students interact with communities of color and/or their productions.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ol>
</div>
<!-- end code region pod_3166666 -->
            
            <div class="text-right hidden-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>
            </section>
          </div>
          <aside aria-label="Right Sidebar">
           <div class="col-md-3 col-sm-3 hidden-sm col-xs-12 sidebar-right">
            
            <div class="text-right visible-xs link-top"><a class="btn btn-color btn-back" href="#to-top"><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-up"></span><span class="sr-only">To Page Top</span></a>
</div>
          </div>
         </aside>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- /container -->

    <br />
  </div>
